Which political decisions in the last 25 years increased the number poor people in germany - and who profited?

+2
Votes

We have more and more unemployed and/or poor people in Germany. People are being forced to work for lower wages and to work for job centers. All these people have very little money, and many of them have to go to the "Tafel" for cheap food.

This poverty isn't only the result of bad "economic climate" or similar, but of political decisions like reducing direct taxes (in which rich people pay more than poor - in percentage and in total) while at the same time increasing "social taxes" (Sozialabgaben) which have to be payed by the poor and almost poor people only.

  • politics
  • poverty. germany
  • profit
Unclaimed

+1
